newsitem.title: USA: Check Point files 5.5 mln shr offer.
newsitem.headline: Check Point files 5.5 mln shr offer.

text.p: Check Point Software Technologies Ltd said Monday it had filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission for a public offering of 5.5 million ordinary shares.
The company said 800,000 of the shares will be sold by the company and 4.7 million will be sold by shareholders.
It said 4.4 million shares will be offered in the United States and 1.1 million will be offered abroad.
The company and the selling shareholders will grant underwriters an option to purchase up to 825,000 additional shares to cover over-allotments.
The offering will be managed by Goldman, Sachs & Co, Hambrecht & Quist, Robertson, Stephens & Co and Wessels, Arnold & Henderson.
